title: Monk
desc:
Post 559
- When played, this goes in your identity zone.
- Whenever a <:lime:1108048230542999633><:green:1106234108042031166><:wild:1106237191388143838> card is played, you gain 1 <:lime:1108048230542999633> energy, it is used as a currency for using abilities
- You may use as many abilities as you want, as long as you have energy.
Abilities:
- Learn the top card in the draw deck. (<:lime:1108048230542999633> 1)
- Gain 2 Shield, whenever you have to draw cards, you lose as much Shield as you can before drawing cards. (<:lime:1108048230542999633> 3)
- Next card you play may be played on any card, as if it were a <:wild:1106237191388143838> card. (<:lime:1108048230542999633> 5)
- Permanently lower the cost of one of your abilities by 1, cannot lower anything below 2. (<:lime:1108048230542999633> 6)
- Make the player with the least cards draw 4 cards, you learn what cards they drew. (<:lime:1108048230542999633> 10)
